name: RTTS
tag_list: software-quality, software-testing, consulting-services, test-strategy, test-tools, ibm-rational, quality-assurance, qa, data-warehouse--test, test-tool-training, automated-test-tools, querysurge, data-warehouse-testing-tool, etl-testing, data-warehouse
overview:
RTTS is the leading provider of software quality and testing for critical business applications. With offices in New York, Philadelphia, Atlanta and Phoenix, RTTS has been serving Fortune 500 and mid-sized companies since 1996. RTTS draws on its expertise utilizing its proven methodology, expert test engineers and the industry’s best-of breed tools (from RTTS and from our alliance partners IBM, HP, Microsoft and others) to provide the foremost end-to-end solution that ensures application functionality, performance, scalabilty and security.

Key differentiators include: ————————————— A proven framework for software quality, including methodologies, templates, best practices, keyword engines, and software tools and utilities to improve the process.

Unmatched experts in the field of software quality and testing.

Skilled engineers who have strong coding skills and are all full-time employees of RTTS (no contractors).

Our own award-winning ALM software, TOMOS Software (www.tomos360.com), which was named ‘Cool Vendor 2009’ by Gartner.

The industry’s only data warehouse testing tool (QuerySurge).

Strategic partnerships with IBM, Microsoft, HP, Oracle and others.

Awards ————————————–

  • Awarded ‘Cool Vendor 2009’ by analyst firm Gartner, Inc. for its award-winning ALM software
  • Named Innovator 2009 by analyst firm Voke, Inc. -Annointed as ‘PIVOTAL’ in the 2011 Market Movers Array Report on Application Lifecycle Management report

Specialties Application Lifecycle Management, Software Quality Assurance, Test Management Solutions, Automated Functional Testing (on-site or Cloud), Application Security Testing (on-site or Cloud), Data Warehouse Testing, Performance/Load Testing (on-site or Cloud)
